sentences.english: At the same time, banks in Western Europe are neck-deep in shaky loans to these countries.

sentences.english: He also fixed a tennis elbow within no time.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時他還治癒了我的網球肘。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Master Roshi is confronted by an old rival.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，龜仙人又遇到了他的一個老對手。

sentences.english: In the meantime, most of the kinks have been worked out.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Wolves want to sign Liverpool midfielder Jay Spearing on a season-long loan.

sentences.english: And in the meantime, they'd pay the banks interest on thosebonds.

sentences.english: At the same time, short-term traders bought to reverse bets that stock prices would fall.

sentences.english: At the same time, they can receive information and knowledge about the development.

sentences.english: In the meantime, Sri Lanka became the centre of the earlier Theravada order of Buddhism.

sentences.english: At the same time, the conflict between the employers and workers led to the strike.

sentences.english: In the meantime, however, the practice will continue.
